mapper.select: select m.* from management m where id in ( select mdr.management_id from management_device_rel mdr where mdr.device_id=#{id} )
mapper.insert: insert into management_device_rel(management_id, device_id, msg_cfg_id) values( (select m.id from management m where m.num=#{management_num}), (select d.id from device d where d.num=#{device_num}), (select c.id from msg_config c where c.name=#{config_name}))
